zoneRequirements.introduction: Luminaires installed in Zone 0 shall be:
requirements: provided with the required degree of protection
designed and constructed specifically for use in a bath, shower, or water container
supplied at a nominal voltage not exceeding 12 V a.c. or 30 V ripple-free d.c.
supplied from a source located outside Zone 0 as an SELV or a PELV system, in accordance with Clause 7.5

zoneRequirements.requirement: Luminaires installed in Zones 1, 2, and 3 shall be provided with at least the required degree of protection.

exceptions.introduction: Regardless of the degree of protection provided by the equipment, the following luminaires may be installed in Zone 2:

items.description: Luminaires of Class II construction (double or reinforced insulation) that require the removal of a cover to access lamps.
notes: A batten holder is not a Class II luminaire.

items.description: Luminaires supplied from a source located outside Zone 2 as an SELV or a PELV system, in accordance with Clause 7.5.
